corplingr 1.0
  • Reference

Reference

All functions

collex_fye()

Iterative Fisher-Yates Exact test for collexeme/collocational analysis

collex_prepare()

Prepare data for collexeme/collocates analysis

collex_prepare_leipzig()

Prepare Leipzig collocates data for collexemes/collocates analysis

colloc_default()

Collocates retrieval for raw corpus text

colloc_leipzig()

Generate tidyverse-style window-span collocates for the Leipzig Corpora

colloc_sentence()

Collocates retrieval on sentence-based corpus

concord_leipzig()

Generate tidyverse-style concordances for the Leipzig Corpora

concord_others()

Simple concordance function

corpus_size_leipzig()

Generate Leipzig corpus-size

demo_corpus_bali

Balinese newspapers texts

demo_corpus_id

Indonesian short stories

demo_corpus_leipzig

Leipzig corpora demo

freqlist_leipzig_all()

Frequency list of all words in a Leipzig Corpus file

freqlist_leipzig_citation()

Check full sentence-citation for a pattern

freqlist_leipzig_each()

Generate word-/regex-specific frequency list from the Leipzig Corpora

freqlist_leipzig_read()

Read in the wordlist files of the Leipzig Corpora

freqlist_leipzig_summarise()

Summarise wordlist count across corpus

span_set()

Prepare window-span vector for collocates

stopwords

Stopwords

tokenise_sentence()

Split a corpus by sentence-boundary
